data.name: Live Coders Conf 3
data.description: An online-only conference put on by The Live Coders team on Twitch! You may be wondering who we are! We are The Live Coders, an outgoing and enthusiastic group of friendly channels that write code, teach about technology, and promote the technical community.

relatedRecords.name: The Finding Ada Virtual STEM Conference
relatedRecords.description: For 2020, Ada Lovelace Day is going back to our roots with a day of blogging, Twittering and Facebooking, just like we did in 2009. #ALD20 will celebrate women, advocates and educators in STEM. We’ll be profiling women working in STEM around the world and those women who work so hard campaigning for…
